mapper.sql: SELECT boardno, userno, title, content, nickname, createdate, boardview, CATEGORYNO FROM board
mapper.select:
SELECT A.boardno boardno, A.title, good FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum , B.* FROM ( SELECT boardno, title FROM board
ORDER BY boardno DESC ) B ) C , ( SELECT boardno, title, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM good WHERE boardno = board.BOARDNO
AND title Like '%${search}%'
AND content Like '%${search}%'
) AS good FROM board ) A
AND rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo} AND C.boardno = A.boardno
mapper.insert:
SELECT board_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (boardno, title, content, userno, nickname, categoryno) VALUES( #{boardNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userNo}, #{nickName}, #{categoryNo} )
mapper.select:
select CATEGORYNAME, CATEGORYNO from CATEGORY
AND CATEGORYNO <> 61
order by CATEGORYNO
select count(*) from ( select USERNO from USERTB where userno is not null )

SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, b.* FROM (SELECT g.boardno, b.title, b.content, b.nickname, b.createdate, b.boardview FROM good g, board b where g.boardno = b.boardno and g.userno = #{userno} order by createdate DESC ) b ) c WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE categoryno = #{categoryNo}
SELECT CATEGORYNAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORYno = #{categoryNo}

SELECT TITLE, NICKNAME, BOARDNO, CATEGORYNO, CREATEDATE FROM ( SELECT TITLE, NICKNAME, BOARDNO, CATEGORYNO, CREATEDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CATEGORYNO ORDER BY CREATEDATE) AS row_num FROM BOARD ) ranked WHERE row_num <= 10 ORDER BY CATEGORYNO, CREATEDATE

select GRADENO from CATEGORY
and CATEGORYNO = #{categoryNo} AND CATEGORYNO <> 61
order by CATEGORYNO
